summary: Now you, the dragon born, can Hyper Beam your enemies to oblivion!
descriptionHtml:
In this mod, Pokemon Moves for Skyrim, you have the chance to use pokemon moves 
in Skyrim! 

These moves include: 
Absorb 
Acid 
Aurora Beam 
Bubble Beam 
Earthquake 
Ember 
Eruption 
Flamethrower 
Gust 
Hyperbeam 
Ice Shard 
Incinerate 
Poison Sting 
Psybeam 
Razor Leaf 
Shadowball 
Shock Wave 
Surf 
Thundershock 
Water Gun 
Whirlpool 

And please make requests! 
_____________________________________________________________ 

To learn a move, go to the Poke Mart, buy a TM and then use the TM! Simple! 

Feel free to ask questions and like this mod!
author: DJSuperGenius
